named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByCommitAndMetric
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.MetricValueDTO (m.id.metricName, sum(m.value)) FROM MetricValue m WHERE m.id.commit.project.id = :projectId AND m.id.metricName IN (:metricNames) AND m.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = m.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = m.id.metricName) GROUP BY m.id.metricName

named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByCommitAndProfile
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.ProfileValuePerCommitDTO (qpm.profile.name, qpm.metricType, sum(mv.value)) FROM QualityProfileMetric qpm, MetricValue mv WHERE qpm.name = mv.id.metricName AND qpm.profile.project.id = :projectId AND qpm.profile.name IN (:profileNames) AND mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = mv.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = mv.id.metricName) GROUP BY qpm.profile.id, qpm.metricType

named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByModule
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.GroupedByModuleMetricValueDTO(mv.id.metricName, sum(mv.value), m.path) FROM MetricValue mv, CommitToFileAssociation a JOIN a.modules m WHERE mv.id.file.id = a.id.file.id AND mv.id.commit.project.id = :projectId AND mv.id.metricName IN (:metricNames) AND a.id.commit.sequenceNumber = mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber AND mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = mv.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = mv.id.metricName) GROUP BY mv.id.metricName, m.path

named-query.name: MetricValue.findValuesAggregatedByFile
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.GroupedByFileMetricValueDTO(mv.id.metricName, sum(mv.value), mv.id.file.filepath) FROM MetricValue mv, CommitToFileAssociation a WHERE mv.id.file.id = a.id.file.id AND mv.id.commit.project.id = :projectId AND mv.id.metricName IN (:metricNames) AND a.id.commit.sequenceNumber = mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber AND mv.id.commit.sequenceNumber = (SELECT max(m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber) FROM MetricValue m2 WHERE m2.id.commit.sequenceNumber<=:commitSequenceNumber AND m2.id.file.identity.id = mv.id.file.identity.id AND m2.id.metricName = mv.id.metricName) GROUP BY mv.id.metricName, mv.id.file.filepath

named-query.name: MetricValue.findRenamedFilesBetweenTwoCommits
named-query.query: SELECT new org.wickedsource.coderadar.metric.domain.metricvalue.RenamedFileDTO(l.oldFilepath, l.filepath) FROM CommitLogEntry l WHERE l.project.id = :projectId AND l.changeType = 'RENAME' AND l.commitName in (SELECT ctf.id.commit.name FROM CommitToFileAssociation ctf WHERE ctf.id.commit.sequenceNumber BETWEEN :commit1SequenceNumber AND :commit2SequenceNumber)
